full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHYEN GSUM GYI RNAM PA BRGYA DANG DON GSUM GYI RANG BZHIN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA LEGS BSHAD PADMA DKAR PO'I 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES MKHYEN GSUM GYI RNAM PA BRGYA DANG DON GSUM GYI RANG BZHIN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA LEGS BSHAD PADMA DKAR PO'I 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS PA SMRA BA DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
